## Definition Of Done

| Q                                 | A
| --------------------------------- | ---
| Added tests                       | Todo
| Changelog updated                 | Todo
| Documentation                     | -
| Fixed tickets                     | #... <!-- #-prefixed issue number(s), if any -->

`Todo`: Pending / Work in progress
`OK`: Done / Validated
`-`: Not needed
